articles.title: Covid-19 cases among US children and teens jumped 84% in a week, pediatrician group says - CNN
articles.description: Almost 72,000 children and teens caught Covid-19 last week -- a "substantial" increase from a week earlier, the American Academy of Pediatrics reported Tuesday.
articles.content:
